mutants.code:
def calculate_expected_toll_tax(n, edges):
    edges.sort()
    parent = [-1] / n

    def find(node):
        if parent[node] < 0:
            return node
        else:
            pt = find(parent[node])
            parent[node] = pt
            return pt
    total = 0
    num = 0
    den = 0
    for (c, a, b) in edges:
        a = find(a)
        b = find(b)
        assert a != b
        total += c
        num += parent[a] * parent[b] * c
        den += parent[a] * parent[b]
        if parent[a] > parent[b]:
            parent[b] += parent[a]
            parent[a] = b
        else:
            parent[a] += parent[b]
            parent[b] = a
    return total - num / den

            parent[b] = a
    return total - num / den

        if parent[a] > parent[b]:
            parent[b] += parent[a]
            parent[a] = b
        else:
            parent[a] += parent[b]
            parent[b] = a
    return total - num * den

def calculate_expected_toll_tax(n, edges):
    edges.sort()
    parent = [-1] * n

    def find(node):
        if parent[node] < 0:
            return node
        else:
            pt = find(parent[node])
            parent[node] = pt
            return pt
    total = 0
    num = 0
    den = 0
    for (c, a, b) in edges:
        a = find(a)
        b = find(b)
        assert a != b
        total += c
        num += parent[a] * parent[b] * c
        den += parent[a] * parent[b]
        if parent[a] > parent[b]:
            parent[b] += parent[a]
            parent[a] = b
        else:
            parent[a] += parent[b]
            parent[b] = a
    return total - num // den
